Texts.Chs: 干得好。我会帮你修复你的飞船^green;传送器^reset;。它应该不再有17.3%的几率干扰你的DNA！现在我们需要找到一个足够的能量源，以使我们可以制造一个新的^orange;FTL引擎^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Good job. I'll fix up your ship's ^green;Teleporter^reset;. It should no longer have a 17.3% chance of scrambling your DNA! Now we need to find an energy source sufficient to assemble a new ^orange;Small FTL Drive^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干得不错！要修好你的^green;传送器^reset;，还需要一个步骤：一个^orange;电磁铁^reset;。在你的^green;加工台^reset;制造一个吧！
Texts.Eng: Good job. There's one more step to getting your ^green;Teleporter^reset; fixed: an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;. Build one at your ^green;Machining Table^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 棒极了！接下来，你需要在你的^green;加工台^reset;制造一些^orange;铜线^reset;。这对于修理你的^green;传送器^reset;的下一个步骤是很有必要的。
Texts.Eng: Great work! Next, you are going to need to make ^orange;Wire^reset; at the ^green;Machining Table^reset;. It'll be necessary for the next step in fixing your ^green;Teleporter^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你好，陌生人。我探测到了你的^orange;大地守护团^reset;标志进入了系统并且立刻展开了研究。你的飞船^red;与这里的恒星发生了一次碰撞^reset;，所以我继续研究并重定向了你的导航系统。
Texts.Eng: Greetings, stranger! I detected your ^orange;Protectorate^reset; signature entering the system and investigated immediately. You were on a ^red;collision course with the sun^reset; here, so I went ahead and redirected your nav system.

Texts.Chs: 如果你想离开这个星球，你首先需要^green;修理你的飞船^reset;。第一步便是制造一个^orange;加工台^reset;(在你的^green;制造栏[C]^reset;里)。在这之后，我们就可以开始你的传送门和跃迁引擎的修理工作了。
Texts.Eng: If you want to get off this planet, you're going to need to ^green;repair your ship^reset;. Step one will be ^orange;Creating a Machining Table^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting menu^reset;. With it we can start to repair your teleporter and engines.

Texts.Chs: 看起来我也很及时。扫描结果显示你的^orange;FTL引擎^reset;已经^red;完全毁坏^reset;了，而你的推动引擎基本上也彻底失效了。我想我们大概能互相帮助。
Texts.Eng: Seems I was just in time, too. Your ^orange;FTL drive^reset;, according to scans, was ^red;completely broken^reset; and your impulse drive is basically dead in the water. I think maybe we can help each other.

Texts.Chs: 全宇宙一流的科学流派经常会参观这里，在这里，你能学到很多东西。快点在你的SAIL上找到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的位置吧！
Texts.Eng: Some of the finest scientific minds in the universe visit there often, and there is a great deal you could learn. Find the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset; on your SAIL!

Texts.Chs: 拿上这个^orange;三度仪^reset;吧。它集成了一些非常有用的功能。按下^green;[Mouse 1]^reset;可以打开^orange;个人属性页面^reset;；按下^green;[Mouse 2]^reset;可以打开^orange;任务管理器^orange;；按下^green;[Shift + Mouse 1]^reset;则可以打开^orange;工具配置页面^reset;
Texts.Eng: Take this ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;. It has several useful functions. Click ^green;[Mouse 1]^reset; for the ^orange;Medical Scan^reset; function. Press ^green;[Mouse 2]^reset; for the ^orange;Task Manager^reset; and press ^green;[Shift + Mouse 1]^reset; for the ^orange;Tool Configuration^reset; dialog.

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你为我进行的调查！你的帮助让我^green;感激不尽^reset;，作为回报...拿上这些^orange;用于你的SAIL的坐标^reset;吧。我在那里运行了一些设备，我想你会喜欢上它的。
Texts.Eng: Thanks for investigating that for me! Your help is ^green;deeply appreciated^reset;! As a thanks...take these ^orange;coordinates for your SAIL^reset;. I run the facility there and I think you'll like it.

Texts.Chs: 这个星球表面有一处^orange;昏暗洞穴^reset;，我已经检测到了一些来自内部的^orange;奇怪信号^reset;，这些能量足够强大，足以提供你离开这个星球所需要的能量。
Texts.Eng: There's this ^orange;Dark Cavern^reset; on the surface I can't fit inside. I've detected ^orange;strange readings^reset; coming from within it before. They're strong enough that the source may provide the energy you'll need to get off-world.

Texts.Chs: 没有^orange;三度仪^reset;我们无法扫描你飞船的^orange;能量源^reset;。不过你还有^orange;我给你的那个三度仪，对吧^reset;?
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we can't scan for a ^orange;power source^reset; for your ship. You've still ^orange;got the one I gave you, right^reset;?

Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;三度仪^reset;，我们就不能进行下一步工作。为了使能源生效，它需要和这个设备进行正确的交互。
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we won't be able to proceed. It needs to interface with this machine to properly enable the power.
